amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 118-656 to add the Delegitimization of U.S.-Taiwan Relations to List of Qualifications for "Entities of Concern.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gottheimer amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gottheimer amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
